name: Planet Builder
description:
HOW TO PLAY: you are  a planet who is trying to grow in mass, but you also have a moon, as you grow u need your moon to grow with you so you don't pull it in. You must also be careful not to let the moon grow bigger than you. 

TIP: if the bar on the left reaches either end, your moon hit your planet or it became the same size as the planet and you lose.

NOTE: the asteroids are invisible for some reason XD

ALSO i made this in 3 days cuz i was bored and found the jam late
